SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Model

Class MessageFactory

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Model.MessageFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObservableMessageToClient<MessageToClient>
public class MessageFactory extends Object implements ObservableMessageToClient<MessageToClient>
This class is responsible for distributing messages generated by model and controller to all listeners. Listeners can be named (corresponds to a ClientHandler) or unnamed (corresponds to loggers).
